bibl.title: Addenda to ICS.
bibl.note: "At intervals (probably biennial) the Society will issue new pages to replace those which have been significantly altered by new information. In the interim, I will publish in BASP notices of amendment or supplements supplied by information contained in papyri recently published or otherwise brought to my attention."
